Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- 6.15 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of six and fifteen hundredths (6.15) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $3,724,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of improving, operating and maintaining the public school system in the District?
